text: læa meux brrda xa ya txan chad cæng khxng rea thuk xan kæ phwk khea (mu chrikin) læw phwk khea klaw wa ni michı khır xun nxkcak chay khn hnung thi prarthna ca yabyang phwk than cak kar thi brrphburusʹ khxng phwk than di khearph phakdi ma kxn læa phwk khea klaw wa ni michı xari xun nxkcak reuxng thec thi thuk xuplokn khun læa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa di klaw nı reuxng khxng sacthrrm meux man di mi mayang phwk khea wa ni michı xun dı ley nxkcak leh kl xyang chad cæng
